## Submission Guidelines

- All assignments must be submitted as `.py` files.
- Your code must pass the provided `doctest` before submission.
- Late submissions will not be accepted unless prior approval is given.

## How to Run Doctests

To verify your assignment before submission, run the following command:
```bash
python -m doctest assignment.py -v
```
